title: Fired US Federal Trade Commissioners concerned about DOGE data access
summary: Recently fired FTC Commissioners Rebecca Slaughter and Alvaro Bedoya sounded the alarm over Elon Musk’s operatives gaining potential access to confidential merger files and nonpublic business data–which could be exploited to manipulate markets or benefit Musk’s companies
